distribute(uint256).details: Distributes USDC to token holders based on snapshot

params.snapshotId: ID of the snapshot to use for distribution

distributeBatch(uint256,address[],uint25.details: Distributes USDC in batches for scalability

params.snapshotId: ID of the snapshot to use

emergencyWithdraw().details: Emergency withdrawal of all USDC (owner only)

returns._0: Total USDC funded for current cycle

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

requiredAmount(uint256).details: Gets the required amount for a snapshot

returns._0: Required USDC amount for full distribution

setMode(uint8).details: Sets the distribution mode for underfunded scenarios

setSnapshotHash(uint256,bytes32).details: Sets the cap table hash for a snapshot (only controller)

params.capTableHash: Hash of the sorted CSV cap table

snapshot().details: Takes a snapshot of current token balances

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

rescueERC20(address,address,uint256).notice: Rescue ERC20 tokens mistakenly sent to this contract (owner only)

rescueERC721(address,address,uint256).notice: Rescue ERC721 tokens mistakenly sent to this contract (owner only)
